= Database Configuration

This config section convert environment variable related to database configuration to valid odoo CLI.

include::partial$converters/gevent.adoc[]


[[option_db_maxconn_gevent]]
== db_maxconn_gevent
specify the maximum number of physical connections to PostgreSQL by the gevent process

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 17.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `DB_MAXCONN_GEVENT` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_int[int].

Odoo cli used:

* --db_maxconn_gevent

[[option_gevent_port]]
== gevent_port
Listen port for the gevent (longpolling) worker.For prior version see longpolling_port

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 16.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `GEVENT_PORT` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_int[int].

Odoo cli used:

* --gevent-port

[NOTE]
====
Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 15.0 this key used the cli `--longpolling-port`
====

[[option_limit_memory_soft_gevent]]
== limit_memory_soft_gevent
Maximum allowed virtual memory per gevent worker (in bytes),
        when reached the worker will be reset after the current request. Defaults to `--limit-memory-soft`.

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 18.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `LIMIT_MEMORY_SOFT_GEVENT` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_int[int].

Odoo cli used:

* --limit-memory-soft-gevent

[[option_limit_memory_hard_gevent]]
== limit_memory_hard_gevent
Maximum allowed virtual memory per gevent worker (in bytes), when reached,
                any memory allocation will fail. Defaults to `--limit-memory-hard`.

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 18.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `LIMIT_MEMORY_HARD_GEVENT` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_int[int].

Odoo cli used:

* --limit-memory-hard-gevent
